Docs.summary: Specifies an class that when implemented represents a security credentials manager.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is the extensibility point for providing a custom security token manager that [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] can use for customizing message and transport security.
SecurityCredentialsManager is a factory that creates instances of classes derived from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager>.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials> implement this class.

## Remarks A <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager> is created by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for every ChannelFactory at the client and for every ChannelListener/endpoint at the service.
Use one of the classes derived from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenManager> class when a custom security token, security token authenticator, or security token provider is needed.
